app_descript:
App Name: Likee
Package Name: video.like

Brief:

Likee is an app that connects the world through a mosaic of original videos, ranging from entertainment to enlightening knowledge content. It's a vibrant social community where you can interact with millions, showcasing a rich array of global talent and personalized content thanks to its smart recommendation technology.
